name: Diorama Series 01 - ALTTP
description:
CONTROLS :

- Left mouse click : drag the diorama to rotate

- Right mouse click : drag the diorama to pan

I made this Diorama as part of a bigger project of mine, create Diorama's out of my favorite retro games ! This one represents Zelda A Link To The Past, inspired by the desert temple.

I really loved the dungeons in this game, the way the world was open , the upgrades, etc. I always liked the art especially in the manual, I used to look at the manual a lot, admiring the artworks!!

Credits :

@LucieLescuyer : 3d art, character, texturing, shaders, concept.

Emery Monzerol (DaMonz) : Music, SFX, animations, programming.
